section.name: Welcome to the AstroGrid Software Site
section.p: This site hosts comprehensive information on AstroGrid software, including how to obtain and use the software, tutorials, background information on the science cases driving the software development, and frequently-asked questions. For more general information on AstroGrid and Virtual Observatories please see http://www.astrogrid.org/.

subsection.name: AstroGrid 1.0 is released
subsection.p: The AstroGrid team in pleased to announce the release of version 1.0.0. For further information please see http://wiki.astrogrid.org/bin/view/Astrogrid/ReleaseV1Pages

subsection.name: Site Monitoring
subsection.p: The status of the main AstroGrid sites is now monitored and published on this site.
